com.percussion.cms.objectstore
Class PSContentType

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSDbComponent
      com.percussion.cms.objectstore.PSContentType
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPSCmsComponent, IPSDbComponent, Cloneable
public class PSContentType
extends PSDbComponent

An object representation of a row in the CONTENTTYPES table. This object is immutable. Note that 2 of the columns that are outdated are not supported by this object.

This is not in the objectstore because we want implementors to access this information via the PSItemDefinition.

Constructor Detail

PSContentType

public PSContentType(int typeId,
                     String name,
                     String label,
                     String description,
                     String editorUrl,
                     boolean hideFromMenu,
                     int objectType)
Creates an object representing a row in the CONTENTTYPES table. No validation on the actual values is performed; i.e., it is not validated that the id really exists, that the name is unique, or that the editorUrl points to a real editor. These validations are performed by higher level code. The following descriptions assume that that valid data is supplied.

Parameters:
typeId - A unique (across content types) numeric identifier for an item definition.
name - A unique (across content types) textual identifier for an item definition. Never null or empty.
label - A descriptive label that should be shown in the UI for this item definition. If null or empty this defaults to the name.
description - An optional message that describes what this type is used for. May be null or empty.
editorUrl - A partial Url to access the html editor associated with this type. Of the form "..//". Back-slashes are normalized to /. Never null or empty.
hideFromMenu - A flag that indicates whether this type should be shown in the CA interface. (The presence of this property needs to be reviewed.)
objectType - An object type id, which point to a row in the object table, PSX_OBJECTS.

fromXml

public void fromXml(Element sourceNode)
             throws com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException
Description copied from class: PSDbComponent
See interface for description. The key is regenerated by taking the node name and using that to derive a class name. An instance of this class is created by passing the key's element to the ctor.

Each component must have a single argument ctor that takes an element and calls its fromXml. The derived class' fromXml must call this method (using super.fromXml) to restore the proper key and db state. Note that this would not be required when initially constructing from xml, but it is required if fromXml is called on an already instantiated object.

This method verifies that the name of the supplied element matches the name obtained with the PSDbComponent.getNodeName() method. If it doesn't, a PSUnknownNodeTypeException is thrown.

Specified by:
fromXml in interface IPSCmsComponent
Specified by:
fromXml in interface IPSDbComponent
Overrides:
fromXml in class PSDbComponent
Parameters:
sourceNode - The node to extract the data for this instance. Never null. See toXml for the required format of the supplied element.
Throws:
com.percussion.design.objectstore.PSUnknownNodeTypeException - If the element name is incorrect, if the key isn't correct (see PSKey.fromXml(Element)) or the state name is not valid.

toDbXml

public void toDbXml(Document doc,
                    Element root,
                    com.percussion.cms.objectstore.IPSKeyGenerator keyGen,
                    PSKey parent)
             throws PSCmsException
See IPSDbComponent.toDbXml(Document, Element, IPSKeyGenerator, PSKey). Since this is a read-only object, this is a not supported operation.

Specified by:
toDbXml in interface IPSDbComponent
Overrides:
toDbXml in class PSDbComponent
Parameters:
doc - This document will be used to create the elements in the result xml fragment. Never null.
root - The generated element will be appended to this node. Never null. If the component doesn't need updating, it won't be appended.
keyGen - This object is used to create new keys when a component has a key that hasn't been assigned yet. Never null.
parent - The parent key of this object. It must be null if the key of the object does not contain parent key (as its foreign key); otherwise it must not be null.
Throws:
UnsupportedOperationException - always.
PSCmsException - If any of the components of the specified type have unassigned keys.

equals

public boolean equals(Object o)
Overrides the base class to compare each of the member properties. All members except the name are compared for exact matches. The name is compared case insensitive.

Specified by:
equals in interface IPSCmsComponent
Specified by:
equals in interface IPSDbComponent
Overrides:
equals in class PSDbComponent
Parameters:
o - The comparee. If null or not an instance of this class, false is returned.
Returns:
true if all members are equal as defined above, otherwise false is returned.

A value computed by concatenating all of the properties into one string and taking the hashCode of that. The name is lowercased before it is concatenated.
